channel.title: Sqvrltastic Art Archive
channel.description: Hi, I'm sqvrltastic and I'm a digital artist. Welcome to my website! This is my main place for posting my artwork and sharing my thoughts.

description.p: THIS IS A TEST. I am testing out if i can add image to rss feed. Ignore this post.[2]

item.title: December 14th 2024
item.description: Small addition to the "About me" page meant to clarify my stance of some further details regarding reposting my artwork.

item.title: December 13th 2024
item.description: Added a button for Wiby, a web search engine specifically for old and indie websites. You can find it in my button collection.

item.title: December 12th 2024
item.description: Added a 88x31 website button. Additionally, I rewrote the "About" page to make it more concise and fixed various typos and grammar mistakes throughout the site.

item.title: December 3rd 2024
item.description: This website was created on December 3rd, 2024, hurray! It's built purely with HTML and CSS and with the help of HUGO website generator.
